about_the_game:
This is a friendly servitor. Use him to unravel some of the more obscure secrets of Who's Lila?

How to use

  • Open Who's Lila? Upon downloading this DLC, a button titled "SUMMON TO DESKTOP" will appear in the main menu. Press it. The shortcut is now on your desktop.

  • Open both apps at the same time.
  • In some rooms, a familiar face will now appear. Sometimes, it's the room itself, and sometimes it's an item that the DAEMON is interested in.
  • Listen for what they have to say.

name: Who's Lila DAEMON

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i3–4150 CPU
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Family
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Russian
*languages with full audio support
